articles.title: Listen as CBS Sports' Jim Nantz caps legendary run as voice of March Madness: 'Thank you for being my friend' - CBS Sports
articles.description: Nantz called his final game as the voice of March Madness, ending a 37-year run across 355 broadcasts
articles.content: The man most affectionately known for his friendly hello bid a warm and thoughtful goodbye. Legendary sportscaster and NCAA Tournament mainstay, Jim Nantz, called his final game as the voice of March… [+2489 chars]
